mapper.insert: INSERT INTO productOrder(orderId, memberId, orderDate, totalAmount, deliveryCharge, payment, cancelAmount, orderState) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{memberId}, SYSDATE, #{totalAmount}, #{deliveryCharge}, #{payment}, 0, 1)

INSERT INTO payment(orderId, imp_uid, payMethod, cardName, cardNumber, applyNum, applyDate) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{imp_uid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payMethod, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardNumber, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TO_DATE(#{applyDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') )

INSERT INTO gongguOrderDetail(gongguOrderDetailId, orderId, cnt, price, gongguProductId,productMoney, userDelete, detailState) VALUES (gongguOrderDetail_seq.NEXTVAL, #{orderId}, #{cnt}, #{price}, #{gongguProductId}, #{productMoney}, 0, 0)

INSERT INTO deliveryDestination(orderId, recipientName, tel, zip, addr1, addr2, pickup, accessInfo, passcode, requestMemo) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{recipientName}, #{tel}, #{zip}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{pickup, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accessInfo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestMemo, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT d.gongguProductId, d.cnt, g.gongguProductName, d.price, g.gongguThumbnail FROM gongguOrderDetail d JOIN gongguProduct g ON d.gongguProductId = d.gongguProductId

SELECT od.orderId, od.gongguOrderDetailId, od.gongguProductId, po.memberId, orderDate, productMoney, gongguReviewId, content, rate, regDate, showReview, answer, answerId, answerDate, block FROM gongguOrderDetail od LEFT OUTER JOIN productOrder po ON od.orderId = po.orderId LEFT OUTER JOIN gongguReview r ON od.gongguOrderDetailId = r.gongguReviewId WHERE po.memberId = #{memberId} AND od.gongguProductId = #{gongguProductId} AND gongguReviewId IS NULL
